name: ORS CVMM Caseload report.
description:
This report returns those Prisoners who have a CVMM Automatic Case Note entry generated on their record. The case note is generated when a CVM Document is saved.
Custodial Violence Management Model (CVMM)
PDD0062 -v00.00.01 Last Modified: 14/06/2016

dataset.name: Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_TIME, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TEXT, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.NOTE_SOURCE_CODE = 'AUTO' AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE IN ('CVMDOC', 'ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE') AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Contact Date(Start):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Contact Date(End):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, CONTACT_DATE, CONTACT_TIME, CASE_NOTE_TEXT, CASE_NOTE_TYPE, CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, AUDIT_TIMESTAMP, DESCRIPTION, COUNT(CASE_NOTE_TEXT) OVER (PARTITION BY SUBSTR(CASE_NOTE_TEXT, 1, 32) = 'CVM - Investigation Report saved') AS V_INVESTIGATION_INCIDENT, COUNT(CASE_NOTE_TEXT) OVER (PARTITION BY CASE_NOTE_TEXT = 'CVM - Investigation Report User Complete saved for this offender.') AS V_INVESTIGATION_USER_COMPLETE, COUNT(CASE_NOTE_TEXT) OVER (PARTITION BY CASE_NOTE_TEXT = 'CVM - Case Referral Form saved for this offender.') AS V_CASE_REFERRAL, COUNT(CASE_NOTE_TEXT) OVER (PARTITION BY CASE_NOTE_TEXT = 'CVM - Care and Management Plan saved for this offender.') AS V_CARE_AND_MAN_PLAN, COUNT(CASE_NOTE_TEXT) OVER (PARTITION BY CASE_NOTE_TEXT = 'CVM - Case Review saved for this offender.') AS V_CASE_REVIEW, COUNT(CASE_NOTE_TEXT) OVER (PARTITION BY CASE_NOTE_TEXT = 'Know Your Prisoner Case Summary saved for this offender.') AS V_KNOW_YOUR_PRISONER, COUNT(CASE_NOTE_TEXT) OVER (PARTITION BY CASE_NOTE_TEXT = 'CVM - Pre-Transfer Report saved for this offender.') AS V_PRE_TRANSFER, COUNT(CASE_NOTE_TEXT) OVER (PARTITION BY CASE_NOTE_TEXT = 'Alert Other and Custodial Violence Management made active.') AS V_ALERT_ACTIVE, COUNT(CASE_NOTE_TEXT) OVER (PARTITION BY CASE_NOTE_TEXT = 'Alert Other and Custodial Violence Management made inactive.') AS V_ALERT_INACTIVE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE = 'CVMDOC' OR V_ALERT_ACTIVE_FILTER = 1 OR V_ALERT_INACTIVE_FILTER = 1))

field.name: $ref:V_INVESTIGATION_INCIDENT
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Text];All) Where (Left([Case Note Text];32) = "CVM - Investigation Report saved")

field.name: $ref:V_INVESTIGATION_USER_COMPLETE
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Text];All) Where ([Case Note Text] = "CVM - Investigation Report User Complete saved for this offender.")

field.name: $ref:V_CASE_REFERRAL
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Text];All) Where ([Case Note Text] = "CVM - Case Referral Form saved for this offender.")

field.name: $ref:V_CARE_AND_MAN_PLAN
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Text];All) Where([Case Note Text] = "CVM - Care and Management Plan saved for this offender.")

field.name: $ref:V_CASE_REVIEW
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Text];All) Where ([Case Note Text] = "CVM - Case Review saved for this offender.")

field.name: $ref:V_KNOW_YOUR_PRISONER
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Text];All) Where ([Case Note Text] = "Know Your Prisoner Case Summary saved for this offender.")

field.name: $ref:V_PRE_TRANSFER
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Text];All) Where ([Case Note Text] = "CVM - Pre-Transfer Report saved for this offender.")

field.name: $ref:V_ALERT_ACTIVE
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Text];All) Where ([Case Note Text] = "Alert Other and Custodial Violence Management made active.")

field.name: $ref:V_ALERT_INACTIVE
field.legacySql: =Count([Case Note Text];All) Where ([Case Note Text] = "Alert Other and Custodial Violence Management made inactive.")

errors.error:
Error: ORA-00907: missing right parenthesis
Help: https://docs.oracle.com/error-help/db/ora-00907/
